title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Understanding and Responding to Instructional Design Failure Phenomena

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish five types of instructional design failure cases: failure in the usage stage, failure in the process stage, reflective opportunities, preventable failures, and inevitable failures.
Learners can identify at least three instructional design failure cases that may occur in real work environments.
Learners can derive at least two improvement strategies through failure case analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
